website_summaries.verdict: A huge hammock really made for two.
pros: Holds two people without any problems
Great for tall people because of its extra length of over 10 feet
Comfortable and able to handle a lot of weight – rated for up to 1,000 lbs
We really like the sturdy design features of carabiners attached with straps instead of ropes
cons: Included ropes are not enough to hang the hammock

customer_reviews.title: Good hammock, You should get one.
customer_reviews.text: I've only got to use this in my yard so far, it's the first hammock of any kind I've tried. I think the hammock is great and easy to hang. I did buy different straps then what it came with, which was like a rope. It's stitched very well and has nice carabiners that hook great into the strap I bought. I am 5'11 and there hubby is 6'2" it held us both of us without any problems. However, if you're going to have two people in one hammock you better really like the other person. I think the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect!! I hung it between my jeep and a tree and it was PERFECT!!! If I had the need for more I would buy more :) I'm 5'2 and can lay out fully from side to side with a few inches to spare. It held the weight of my daughters and myself. Paired with the XL hammock straps it's just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Poor rope quality....
customer_reviews.text: I gave it one star. it gets a low rating because the pain lancing through my back and butt right now. The ropes they send with it are not strong enough. They will break! I've only had it a month and the rope snapped so easily. Literally maybe the 4th time I've had it out. Very unhappy right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say, the product I ordered from MalloMe arrived SO fast... I didn't expect it until like 3 day after I actually got it. I went ahead and ordered the XL straps due to the reviews I read. Have you ever considered just putting those straps with your hammocks? Any way, I have had it for a few days and I've used it once so far, zero complaints. It held me and my friend as we talked for hours and had a small picnic. I will definitely use this product a lot, as summer is coming up and I travel often. Anyway, long story short, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: peepeepoopoo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is GORGEOUS, soft and comfortable! And the size is perfect for two people to lay in comfortably. Thanks for a great product at a great value! *HEADS UP SHOPPERS: This hammock is HUGE! If you're shopping for just you consider a smaller one.*
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Hammock
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hammock, will hold my entire family of four. The ropes that come with it require some knot tying to secure. Do yourself a favor and get a set of straps.  . Super large and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Split in half after 3 uses! 1000lb limit is a lie!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this hammock the 1st couple of times I used it, but it split in half the 3rd time I used it. I bought this specifically because it was rated to hold 1000 pounds, as I'm a big woman (400lbs) and wanted a hammock that would hold me without it breaking. I have wanted to hammock before but have always been afraid of them breaking, so I was so excited to find this one. Very disappointed that this product did NOT hold up to what it advertised! Will never buy from this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing for less than 30days and it got wet with the rain and all the green color die bleed onto the yellow. It looks awful and Dirty! Junk
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: I'm using it right now!
customer_reviews.text: I'm slung between two trees over a stream on an 85 degree cloudless day. I'm comfortable and relaxed in this hammock that took two minutes to set up. I'm loving life right now! The hammock seems well made and easy to pack around, I'm looking forward to a great summer with this thing! I bought the MallowMe straps as well and they made setup a breeze, less than a minute!
customer_reviews.author: Johntbolds

customer_reviews.title: It broke and I slammed down on the concrete
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I contacted MalloMe and they handled this acceptably. Apparently, the folk who assembled the hammock failed to properly loop the strap through one end of the hammock. In other words, this was not a matter of bad materials, it was how the hammock was assembled. ORIGINAL POST: I literally just 10 minutes ago fell out of this hammock onto the hard concrete when the strap broke free from the end of this hammock!!! My left elbow took most of the hit. Providentially, I was checking this for my 14-year old daughter before she got in and used it. This is totally inexecusable. Cheap, shoddy workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: best purchase for camping
customer_reviews.text: i camp about once a month during the summer and putting up and taking down the 8 person tent for me and my dog is getting tedious. one of my buddies has one of these and brought it camping. so i decided, why not try it? its amazing, didnt even setup my tent. threw in the ole sleeping bag, no pillow needed. dog between my legs. slept GREAT, no aches. its fantastic, wish i could give it 10 stars. also make sure you purchase the XL Hammock Straps. they make setup super easy. im thinking about getting a stand so i can set it up at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all, we had a rain here and it bled the dye all over and looks terrible now. It's not even a cool looking tie-dye, it just looks yucky. I didn't have but two weeks. If you get one of these you might want to keep it only indoors. DO not let get wet.
customer_reviews.author: eaglesRrare

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold 1000 pounds -strap breaks with few hundred pounds.
customer_reviews.text: Item is easy to assemble but straps are not sturdy. I had two teenagers on it weighing a total of about 220 pounds and the straps broke and both kids were slightly hurt when they slammed to the ground. One hurt her elbow and the person hurt hand and hip. The hammock nylon was nice and color was vibrant. Strap terrible though. Definitely doesn't even hold 400 ponds- let alone 1000 pounds as the item is advertised for.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: After 2 weeks of use: review
customer_reviews.text: Updated review after 2 weeks of use: Thisbhammock is absolutely amazing and durable. This feels like parachute-quality material. Not a single tear or rip. I did have to slightly adjust the straps onneach ejd so that the rope would rest on the doubled-up part of the strap. I've used it a dozen times with my girlfriend and left it out in the rain and sun. Holds up great! I frankly did not expect this kind of quality for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Woodcement

customer_reviews.title: rope to short. buy straps
customer_reviews.text: the ropes are nowhere near long enough. also no instructions for tying the rope. Maybe because they couldn't do it with that short of rope. other brands come with straps for a similar price. i just got this one because i was getting a lot and wanted the color. All 7 hammocks (five other brands) were put up in a few minutes. my 2 MalloMes are sitting here as I get more and more frustrated watching knot tying videos on youtube. the hammock itself is fine but why even include the rope. it implies I'll be able to set it up with what is included. maybe if my tree was as skinny as a pole.
customer_reviews.author: reader in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Best hammock for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best hammock for the price! Seriously forget about over priced ENO hammocks this double nest hammock is quality made! And for the price I seriously don’t understand why people pay ridiculous prices for expensive hammocks. This hammock has no problem holding my girlfriend and I, I weigh about 215lbs and she weighs about 130lb. Anyways you get the point, it’s an awesome product if you don’t want to spend a fortune on a hammock and receive an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: No packaging or instructions
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my brother who loves camping and it arrived in a clear plastic bag with no actual packaging, product description, or instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'2" tall, 300lbs and 54 years old with a bad back. I thought my outdoor camping adventures were over until I discovered kayak hammock camping!! I will never sleep on the ground again!! This hammock is nothing less then awesome!! The very durible parachute material and stiching is rated to 800lbs and has no problem holding my big self! Buy a mosquito sock netting and tarp and turn this hammock into a year round camping dream!!! Truly a great product and price. Only thing I would like to see added would be a preinstalled adjustable ridgeline.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Eichholtz

customer_reviews.title: Double check description!! ROPES not straps!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of glancing at the picture and thinking these came with straps and not ropes. Saved a lot more money but ended up spending more to buys straps separately. Do yourself a favor and buy the ones that come with the straps already. The hammock itself is perfect and durable. Just wish the ropes weren’t so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: HandleyMom

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS! DO NOT USE INCLUDED ROPE!!!
customer_reviews.text: DANGEROUS!! DONT USE INCLUDED ROPE TO HANG YOUR HAMMOCK!! We had our hammock hung for less than a week and it snapped while my husband was swinging in it. I had just taken our 7month old out of it to put him down for a nap. My husband walked away with just a concussion but it could have killed our son if he were still in it with my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compact hammock for camping or chilling at the park.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this almost two years now and still love it. Very comfortable for either one or two people. It's big! For two, there's still plenty of room to stretch out, and its a good quality fabric. Hasn't really stretched out and feels nice on your skin, it's super strong, and thin enough that the whole thing packs down to the size of a football, into its own attached bag that doubles as a hanging cell phone pocket when the hammock's set up. Pro tip: Take some chip clips with you if you go camping with it solo, there's enough fabric that you can clip the top shut while you sleep and keep the bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Danger!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! The straps that secure this to the fabric came completely unstitched and my 75lb daughter collapsed on the ground hurting her back. This was the 1st time anyone used this. It wasn’t an error in install. The stitches literally separated the strap with the carabiner from the parachute fabric.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product at a Reasonable Price!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, strong durable fabric, easy set up/take down- comes with an attached drawstring bag which converts into a side pocket to put your keys, phone, snacks, etc. No misplaced or lost bag when you’re ready to pack up and go. Just fold, and roll back into the attached bag. Doesn’t take up much space in my backpack. Easy to wash, dries quickly. Love that it already comes with secure hook attachments on both sides, so all you need to do is tie the cords around each tree, and hook the hammock on securely. Reasonably priced for a quality product! We were impressed!
customer_reviews.author: E.K.D.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is absolutely amazing! Its is extremly light weight, durable, breathable and overall amazing! I was debating on buying this for the longest time and now I wish I had purchased it sooner! I do recommend investing in a pair of hammock hanging straps. It not only makes putting the hammock up and tearing it down easier it also gives you peace of mind for sturdiness. This is one of my favorite purchases of the year. If you are on the fence about buying this do yourself a favor and pull the trigger, the first time you lay in this hammock will be money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Will Koz

customer_reviews.title: VERY DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had this hammock a bit and finally put it up this summer. It has been awesome!!! Not only is it wonderful as a relaxing swing but has held up to tons of abuse by my 8 year old and his buddies on the block! It has been put through the wringer! Yanked, pulled, and piles of boys and still shows no wear and tear! I have even washed it and it was left in the rain. Best purchased. I also got the suggested ties to go with it since the trees were so far apart. Perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Crow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent we definitely pushed the weight capacity on this and it passed the test we purchased the straps 1500lbs as you can see from the video it held all the weight and not only that when it was time to pick it up it was a sinch just went right into the sack. This is an Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: cigarbundlesofmiami

customer_reviews.title: Compact.(we use it for motorcycle camping)
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooo comfortable!!!!! Can not wait to use it again. And the company is so good, this is what they did. The hammock came with ropes, not straps. I really did not care, as I used my tie down straps from the bike trailer. But.......I just received a message from the company on Facebook, stating if I had bought one of these hammocks, to send them the order number. (so did anyone else that bought one). They are sending the straps out for free. And this is to people who did not even question it!!!! That is honesty, and taking care of customers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Was unusable out of bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend for her birthday and was sad to hear that upon opening it, she was unable to use it on her trip. The ropes came with no knots for tying to tree and were not long enough to tie on their own. I have purchased other portable hammocks from Amazon with much success but this one was a total bust which was unfortunate because the hammock itself seemed comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: 10 star rating!! Love this hammock
customer_reviews.text: I give this hammock a 10 star. I had it latched between two trees. Very comfortable and durable. My teenager loves and so do my grandbabies. We had a windstorm blow over my tree that the hammock was attached to. Hammock is in one piece and is still usable. How awesome is that! My kids and grand kids swing in it and thrash that thing and it's still surviving. I think I am buying another one just so I can have one when I go camping. Almost forgot pushing 400 lbs with me my eldest daughter and my husband. We all laid on it together and held us just fine.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Glorious
customer_reviews.text: OK, the colors on these are spectacular to begin with -- grey should be illegal -- and then it's gigantic! And comfy! And can hold me and both my parents! And the attached bag that you can stuff the hammock into for travel also doubles as a safe place to put your Nook and phone and whatever else falls out of other hammocks! I love my house, I have loved this house for two decades, and this is now my favorite part!
customer_reviews.author: Lashel

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and affordable, but...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a lightweight and easy to set up hammock. The only issue I have is it’s VERY off center. No matter which way you hang it, or how you set it up, one side is far lower than the other, almost rolling you out of the hammock on one side, and making it nearly impossible to get out from the other side. It appears to be a design defect in how the ends are secured that results in it listing to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my grandson, he loves it! It is easy to use and comes fully self contained, I do keep extra rope for traveling in case the situation calls for it, have fun! This has become my favorite spot in the yard! My grandson and I can both fit in together. We sit in the hammock and listen to birds and enjoy conversation in the shade! I can fit my oontz speaker, my phone and my sunglasses in the ultra big pocket that you actually fold the hammock back into, lovin' it!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock, perfect for larger stature people
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few hammocks and this one is really the best. I am rather on the heavy side and no issues with this item. The first hammock I had, I broke right through it. It is light weight and easy to pack. I go hiking a lot and just pick a location to spend the night. It is very durable and hasn't ripped. I have had no issues with the attachments on this. Other hammocks have come apart or torn on the ends. I recommend this item for sure. I have two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Gold3nMan

customer_reviews.title: Purchase the straps with this hammock they are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am at least 350 lbs. Was super worried about the quality of these hammocks. After searching and reading reviews i decided on this one for a wilderness camping trip. My first time hammock camping. We had to canoe or hike to the site so i wanted something lightweight that could hold me. I bought the straps to go along with it. Great decision. I was able to get set up super quickly just before rain came in and being off the ground was perfect for a stormy weekend. I am not mechanically inclined so believe it when i say this was easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pearso

customer_reviews.title: Lames ropes/straps. Similar $15 body.
customer_reviews.text: About the same quality as another we have. Thin, almost parachute material. Downside for this one is the lower quality straps and rope. This was about the cheapest online. Look specifically for what straps come with it. I think the material for the fabric is all the same from some big factory. Do not leave in the sun and weather to prolong life.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: The material is thin but no air can move through it so don’t cacoon into it expecting to stay cool
customer_reviews.text: This product is light weight it’s some what comfy if you can find enough space to hang it It needs more than 15 feet to hang on trees trunks and if you hang on limbs it rolls up like a swing but could get it set up right The material is thin but no air can move through it so don’t cacoon into it expecting to stay cool Again this is a great product it’s just hard to find a place to hang it
customer_reviews.author: MeganSteele

customer_reviews.title: meditate, swing, or sleep.-or all the above.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best purchase I’ve made in a very very long time. Not only is it fun to swing on but it’s a great place to meditate every morning. It is so comfortable I’m tempted to sleep in it instead of my bed. Such a great deal for such a low price; peace of mind is priceless and this-hammock makes it that much easier to attain.Easy to assemble sturdy and beautiful colors thank you.
customer_reviews.author: By JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Keep hangin'
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammock. My boyfriend and I hit the park and hang our hammock under some trees. So peaceful. Folds up nice and small and slides into the attached bag. I have no problems balling the hammock back up and getting in to the bag. Has a pocket to slide your phone and keys into. I purchased... Pro Hammock Tree Hanging Straps (Set of 2) w/ CARABINERS – 400LB rated (1200LB tested), Adjustable 30+2 Loops, Non-Stretch, Easy Setup, Heavy Duty, Tree Friendly  To hang the hammock.
customer_reviews.author: COLBY

customer_reviews.title: Tiny hammock big impact- definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A great hammock. Really wraps around you while you are sleeping inside. I love how it folds into a tiny little bag- makes life easier for campers and hikers. Would definitely recommend. Wish these came with straps as this one did not originally and I had to purchase separately. After a year or so MalloMe reaches out to offer straps to us as they were not included at that time. I do not know if they are included now.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Ripped after two uses. I hung in backyard and had one awesome night. Evening #2 it had a small hole and what looked like a small seam loose. 15 minutes later the whole thing ripped right across. We followed all weight restrictions and limitations, but it failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Family Hammock!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say?? Its a great Hammock at a great price. Used it last week for a family camping trip. Held me, my two sons (8 and 12) and our dog. Easy to set up and easy to take down. I did use "straps" that I already owned instead of the rope ties that came with the hammock. But even if I would have purchased the straps along with the hammock I would have felt it was still a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Styles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent choice as a gift. Purchased as a birthday gift for my SO with the XL Hammock Straps. What a great combo. It held 400# comfortably with room to spare. Excellent length for those that are tall. We even had excess material to lap over us to keep out the cool breeze of the mountains. With 2 kids 8-9, who prefer it as a lay down swing, it was perfect. Lots of fun to be had by the whole family. They felt like it was a cocoon with privacy. In addition it fit the four of us together but you better be the cuddly type for that. That put a total weight of about 575#.
customer_reviews.author: NurseRN

customer_reviews.title: Suited our needs well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought hammock for family camping trip and definitely suited our needs. Very compact storage, so perfect for already overpacked vehicle. Set-up very simple. Like stated in other reviews, the ropes are fairly short and I utilized recommendation from another reviewer to purchase lashing straps. Together the hammock worked great for our camping trip. Hammock itself comfortable, but does kinda wrap around you, which is to be expected since doesn't have any support keeping it open wide. Great purchase for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: The PIZ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, worth every penny, KIDS LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Has been hanging in the backyard all summer. Storms, rain, wind, sun... still looks brand new. Kids get in it several times a week and are not gentle with it. Lots of "how high can we swing someone" and "how many kids can fit". No rips or tears or wear spots that I can find... still looks new. While I'm pretty sure most of the hammocks in this pricerange are 99% the same, this one has been great for us so far and looks like it's gonna hold up for a very long time. Money very well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kesler

customer_reviews.title: Get the tree straps.
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammock, triple stitching, strong carabiners, I wish I had read the description clearly because the tree straps weren't part of this deal. I used the ropes around two tress and it worked well. A+. I've ordered another MalloMe hammock, but this time with the tree straps...
customer_reviews.author: Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t come with the ropes!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock did not come with the rope it was supposed to have. I will give an appropriate review after I have the ropes sent so I can try it out. What food is a hammock with out the ropes to hold it up! MallowMe, please reach out to me so we can resolve this! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: lindaxyz

customer_reviews.title: Great value!! Super light
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good quality hammock that wouldn't cost me a fortune like some Eno hammocks that go for $100. This was is fraction of the cost and worked great!! Took it on dates and both girl & myself fit in it quite well and held up our combined weight no problem! If you're bigger in size I wouldn't recommend it, but aside from that great product, and super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Walker

customer_reviews.title: Light and sturdy.  Very comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock. I bought this for our one week tent camping trip and figured that I could relax in this hammock during the day. After tying the supplied ropes to two trees, I hooked the carabiners to the rope and slid in. It gave me nice protection from some slight winds and it wasn’t long before I was comfortable and asleep! I unhooked the one end each night and stuffed everything back in the attached carrying bag so it would keep the dew off of it during the night. It is well built, sturdy and very comfortable and most importantly lightweight. I’ll even think of putting it up in our own trees at home.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dittrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock - Higher capacity then ENO
customer_reviews.text: I did receive the hammock and straps from Amazon right on time. Product was packaged well and was easy to fold back up for storage. All my kids have ENO's that cost three times more then the MalloMe and I would put your product up against theirs any day. I chose your brand due to having a higher capacity. No issues with quality and has already been used twice this week. Look forward to much more time enjoying the great outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for one of these hammocks for a while, but wasn't sure if I should spend the money on one. However, when I saw this one for only about $13, I figured that was too good of a price to pass up on. I brought it with me on a camping trip, and slept in it for a night, and that was one of the best sleeps I've had in a while (maybe it was due to the busy day beforehand, but I still felt great and well-rested after!), and I can't wait to bring this on my next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: This Rocks.
customer_reviews.text: The customer service related to this person is top notch - they are very eager to make sure we are happy and that the product meets our needs. And, let me be clear, it does! This was a gift to our teenage kids - a group that is not easily impressed - though they love it! It was put up in our wooded backyard immediately despite the cold and THEY LOVE IT! It was easy to setup, comfortable to lay in, and SWEET. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: GMDimples33

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how light the hammock is. The storage pouch is easy to pack. The included straps weren't quite enough for me, or long enough for what I might need so I bought extra straps. It did come with biners, which was nice. I'm 6'9" and had no trouble fitting in the hammock. It was really comfortable. The hammock was wide enough it closed over me, so I didn't have any problems with bugs in the middle of the night. Really breathable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: TakingTheHighGround

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 complaint: it bleeds in the wash, but I just wash it alone if it has to be. It’s made a kind of tie dye effect on it, but I don’t mind. Holds up super well. My spouse and I can both lay in it on a regular basis and it holds up very well (at one point we were both very overweight also)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hammock
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is great. I love that it folds into the attached pouch so you aren’t hunting for where it goes when it’s time to pack up. The rope it comes with to hang it is a bit weak.... there’s already a few shred marks and it’s been used once. No biggie to buy new ones. The hammock itself is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Owner contacted me to ensure I enjoyed my Purchase
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After taking it out for 1 night it had ripped a very large hole in the middle of it. It worked amazing the first night but the second night I was very disappointed. Hammocks a great size. Material seems to be very strong and lightweight. I like how everything fit easily in the bag. Would recommend for a hammock to throw in the back of your car or truck and take camping or adventuring around. Also liked how the owner took time out of his day to contact me and make sure I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS HAMMOCK SYSTEM!
customer_reviews.text: We have expensive REI versions of this product and this brand is impressively equivalent to any pricier version! The extra XL straps were a must for rough bark trees and are super well made, have sewn loops the whole length to accommodate any distance of trees, and durable! Perfect product, and with two big kids being pretty rough on it, I feel confident I’m recommending to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kjoy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but can't believe this is for 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but can't believe this is for 2 people. I'm 6'2" 250lbs and my wife is 5' 120lbs and there's no comfortable way we could both lay in this hammock. I bought the extra straps just maybe I'm putting it up wrong. Maybe show an example of how it should be set up. I would love for it to work for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive whole thing
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the carrabiners, cordage, storage bag. Was delivered a day late and the Amazon envelope it was delivered in was ripped open with just a parachute material hammock hanging out. I would love to try it out but I expected a complete set up just requiring a couple of willing trees. No such luck.
customer_reviews.author: ndsaddl

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing hammock. As a large fellow I generally thought my hammock days were behind me. Where do you even buy a hammock? These thoughts and more kept me hammock-less for years. This thing is very well made and super durable. Very heavy stitching on the very few seams lead to no weak points what so ever. I haven't gotten straps and wish I had, but the ropes will do the trick for a while. It is supremely easy to set up. It takes legitimately only a minute. I'm 6 foot 6, and I have no issue at all with this hammock. It is very roomy. I would certainly recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Funkystuff

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok, not necessarily comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars for comfort and durability . Because the material seems so thin itll rip after some use. And the area to lay down it seemed weird. The dark area you lay in, and the rest just kind of flops to the side. Maybe it was the way we hung it? We've only used it once. Over a weekend camping trip. It is fun to use though. And I believe worth a $16 purchase
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very solid hammock. I use it around the pier at the beach and it works well. I use it with my girlfriend and I in it. Seems like it would be a bit bigger to be considered a 2 person tent but still decently comfortable even with the 2 of us In it. Easy storage, doesnt take up any space and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: OMG Yes
customer_reviews.text: I bought a green one. Also bought the straps from them too based off of reviews saying to just do it. I did it. It was ridiculously easy to set up in less than five minutes. It's ridiculously comfortable. It's ridiculously secure. My 7 year old loves it and tries to kick me out of it. He spent his allowance to buy himself an orange colored one. Then my mom tried it and loved it. She bought herself a purple one. Buy it. It's huge, comfortable, and worth it. Also, make your life simple and buy the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Mo808

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product I am so happy that I purchased it we have another similar Hamic that my husband always uses and to be honest with you this Hamic is so much better than that it’s so much more comfortable is so much more easy to get in it is so much more relaxing and it is so much easier to just cook on with the carabiners that are included I am soPlease send I would definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Elle Lopez

customer_reviews.title: very comfy and lightweight for summer!
customer_reviews.text: i love it.. i don’t have any trees within a good distance to each other so i had to hang on some poles but works great and might need to buy extra strings because i feel they will wear down after a couple of months if you use everyday or so.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTexasCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Durable in extreme conditions
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my son and his family for camping, but my son was more excited because as a sailor, he said his crew mates have this hammock and sometimes wherever they are stationed, they get out the hammock (sometimes using it on their boats) and guys fight over it. He was thrilled to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was afraid my shoes would tear it but still good after five uses
customer_reviews.text: Material was surprisingly strong. I was afraid my shoes would tear it but still good after five uses. Easy to repackage into the attached bag. The carabiner is a bit sharp if you open it, but no real reason to if you not it right. Overall I'm extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Duhkgeorge

customer_reviews.title: These are the cats pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love your hammocks! I had already bought a different hammock but my buddy bought yours the size, quality and shape of your hammock is the most comfortable. And be tween me and my 5 friends we have tried 6 or 7 brands and all of us have decided that your set up and straps are the best, so expect a few more customers coming your way from us.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: EASY SET UP AND DURABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is FANTASTIC!!! Super easy to set up and it holds myself (not light) and my family all at the same time!!! I am glad I purchased the extra straps as those made it even easier to set up and can hold more weight. Taking it on vacation next week and can’t wait to use it to relax in!! Will definitely get from same company if others in the family want to get one.
customer_reviews.author: SkolCyCubs

customer_reviews.title: listening to nature just got more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: order was filled and shipped promptly, I opened the shipping carton and unpacked the hammock to inspect it, set it up in my shop between two of the roof columns :-) I am very pleased with this item, it is very well constructed and sturdy, plus it is very easy to roll up & store in the attached "stuff sack", I look forward to enjoying it in the woods, once the snow melts and the temperatures rise above 50, stay tuned for an update with pictures once Spring arrives ;-)
customer_reviews.author: trainutt

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock!
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock, especially for the price. It's extremely lightweight, durable, and dries super fast. I keep it set up between a couple of orange trees in my backyard (exposed to the Florida elements), and so far it has held up really well. Very happy with this purchase, would absolutely use for camping without concern.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: High Quality & Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and great value! Apparently hammocks are a "thing" on my daughter's college campus. We couldn't believe the price compared to some others. It fits in the little bag no problem. Practically weightless. The straps/ropes worked fine to hold up even Mom's weight. Still, I think mom is likely to augment the purchase with the looped XL straps which look really great.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Issues

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This hammock holds the weight it says it does. Been using it for quite a while and it still holds up in the wind and with many different people of different ages laying on it. It is not as comfortable as other hammocks I have owned, but this product is still worth the price and worth a look into. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ellebracht

customer_reviews.title: Good value, incorrect dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Ok first of all the double is a great value at $25. However, the hammock I received is not 7 feet wide in the middle, it is just over 6 feet. Overall it’s a good value, but if you truly want to sleep two people in a hammock I’d probably look at one of the Eno double deluxe or something, but this is great solo or for lounging.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews on this one and a couple others before deciding this was the one. Such a great purchase! Went camping and took a hour plus nap in it with my husband! Used ratchet straps instead of buying the hammock ones and they work perfect made it even easier. I was concerned about being able to put the hammock and straps back in the tiny bag. But it wasn't even an issue. TOTALLY WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Stiffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, even for the bigger gentleman
customer_reviews.text: This is my first camping hammock. I have been afraid because of the lighter weight restrictions I see I so many of these type of hammocks. I am a bigger guy 6'4" around 300 lbs., With that said I used it this weekend and it worked out great!. It was so easy to setup with the MalloMe straps that I also purchased. The hammock was great and I wasn't worried it would break on me at any second. Great product, keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: THe Double DD

customer_reviews.title: It's the most sturdy & comfortable Hammock there is!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Hammock so much I had to get a second one!!! It's such a family favorite! So roomy & comfortable!!! Love it! The parachute fabric keeps it's bright colors & is so easy to clean. I don't miss all the little broken threads of a woven one! This is sturdy and of excellent construction and materials! Love the pocket for my phone too!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Niel Allen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Laying in it right now. Super comfortable. Shows absolutely no sign of wear. I put it up on day 1. This is day 11. It’s weathered multiple storms. I’m totally impressed. I put it up in the shade and it was the perfect escape on near 100degree days. And almost impossible to want to get out of. Never heard of this company, but another Amazon deal of the day win!!! Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miller High Life

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son-in-law and he loved it! He raved about the quality and how nicely it was made. Would definitely recommend this hammock. We got the blue one and the color was vibrant. According to my son-in-law, the straps were double stitched and the size of the hammock was really great. He was shocked when I mentioned to him how little I paid for such a nice hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 5 Girls

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for the price! I also got the tree straps from this company and I highly recommend those as well! I haven't had any problems so far and it's been used often!! A friend and I both have hung out for an afternoon in it and it's pretty comfy even with two people!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Better than an Eno
customer_reviews.text: Going on strong for two years! Bought a second for my wife and we love them! I've owned two Enos and the cost between this with straps and a single Eno is enough to give it a try. I promise you won't be disappointed. Forever customers!
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn-Wright Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I took this hammock on a two week backpacking trip to Yellowstone National Park. It was perfect. The material was very breathable. I am a very big man (275 pounds) and this hammock had no problem supporting me. I would recommend buying hammock straps. They are alot easier to set up than what comes with this hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Attig

customer_reviews.title: Vibrantly colored and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Vibrantly colored and easy to pack. In practice, the double parachute hammocks don't really work comfortably with two people - you just squish on each other in the middle. However, you can fold the extra fabric over top of you like a cocoon. Would be even better if it had velcro or tabs that you could then fasten together - I may sew these onto mine.
customer_reviews.author: SAlt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We went to camping last week. I got this bcz it said it can hold up to 1000lb. I wanted to lay down with my whole family (My hubby, two kids and I. We enjoyed with this hammock and it was strong enough 💪
customer_reviews.author: Jane Byeon

customer_reviews.title: Loving this hammock!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't entirely sure what to expect, but the price was right. So glad I got it! It comes in its own pouch that is down on, and folds easily back into it. It also comes with two pieces of rope and D-Ring clips already attached, so we had it hung in 5 minutes. I found it to be comfortable, and like that it can cover over the top. It got warm if in direct sunlight, which was fine. Overall well made and well worth it so far
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this at Christmas and just used it on a camping trip and hate this hammock. The nylon rope are too short and the overall quality is dreadful. Don’t buy this hammock. I only wish we can return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C. Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hammock because I don’t believe in paying full price for brands like eno. This item is less than half the price. It can hold the weight of two people. It’s big enough to cover above you if you’re the only one in it. It is very easy to set up. You can set it up in one minute once you get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed with this hammock. I am a 450 lb guy so I bought the hammock for me to start trying to Hemmock camping with my daughter and get more Outdoors. To lose weight and get back in to rehoning my outdoor skills . and teaching my daughter new skills for her outdoor life. I was very impressed with the hammock in the construction and durability. I was kind of hesitant at first because of the thin material. It was very impressive and I truly believe it would hold the 1000 pounds like it said
customer_reviews.author: Charles carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this hammock. My husband received it as a gift for his birthday. This is made of high quality with great attention to detail. My husband knows quality outdoor gear and is highly impressed with his gift. I would HIGHLY recommend this. He has enjoyed using it during camping trips. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good at first.  Can be dangerous
customer_reviews.text: It was great at first. Then it collapsed with my autistic nephew was in it. One end just fell apart. He fell. Things went crazy from there. Normally I would ask for a replacement but due to safety I would prefer a refund. Best as I can tell this isn’t safe at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This hammock made me remember how fun it was to just hang out.
customer_reviews.text: This hammock was exactly what I needed when shopping for outdoor gear. It was easy to set up in the woods, great quality material, lightweight for long hauls, and extremely easy to fold back into the pouch. The orange color stood out so I would be easily found by friends in the area, and the larger size actually worked out better as I could wrap myself up to protect my face from the sun and wind when needed and will eventually work for some hangout time with my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M. Israel

customer_reviews.title: The only thing i dont like so far is that the rope that comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: I havent gotten to test this yet as it has been raining and snowing since I got it. I can say it feels solid so far. The packed up version was smaller than i expected, a major plus. The only thing i dont like so far is that the rope that comes with it does not feel very substantial. I will be replacing it with rachet straps. I would have rather paid just a little more to have something better included.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is very compact
customer_reviews.text: I used this hammock this past week on a camping trip and I have to say, I love it. It is very compact,easy to set up, and very comfortable. I took a couple nice naps in this hammock and my 4 and 6 yeAr old enjoyed using it as a swing. I couldn't get them out of it. I also sat in it with them and it held us all nicely
customer_reviews.author: sporty 1

customer_reviews.title: Compact for easy carry
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for our camping trip as well as for my parents since they like to camp a lot. We gave them a large orca cooler for Christmas filled with camping supplies and this was one :) can’t beat it for the price. Large, comfortable and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Perfection 1/3 the Cost
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Its1/3 the price of brands like Eno @ $120 or Roo @ $110 but same great quality and this is the only hammock designed to support 2 people over 200 each Most double hammocks only go to 400lbs this one goes to 1000lbs and makes me and my wife feels safe for sure even when the kid or the dog hops in no worries about breaking. Came with everything except the straps and there straps are some of the best and longest out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Pharris

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware Ropes not Straps!
customer_reviews.text: Please make note when purchasing this item that it only comes with rope to secure to a tree. I had just purchased one prior that came with the adjustable straps and thought that is what I was getting. Unfortunately, I didn’t realize it until it was too late and had to use it, so returning it wasn’t an option. I prefer the straps!!! When you can’t get the knot undone it has to be cut! Don’t want to have to be replacing the rope all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortabl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a camp out and it was awesome. Great material, held up well with over 300+ pounds with multiple people hanging in it. I could sit all day under the trees in this! What was great was that the bag is attached right to the hammock, so it has a self contained carry bag! Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Julia young

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a camping trip. PS...I am 240lbs and this hammock did not give at all. Then we added my 100lb wife and it still didn’t budge. Now that being said. I did add separately purchased straps, but the hammock was very well stitched. I keep it inside when not in use to keep the dry rot away. I would give it 4/5 stars but it does cocoon you pretty fierce.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS HAMMOCK IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this hammock is my new happy place! It’s easy to set up and it’s so comfortable!! My dog and I love cuddling in it. I bought this back in November and I’ve been dying to use it. The straps are worth the extra money, I feel secure and solid in this hammock- and the best part- it packs in a pocket, which can double as a book/phone holder when the hammock is open! Buy this hammock, you won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Light and breezy
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a woven hammock that had come unraveled. I like how airy and breathable this feels. It's on a hammock stand currently, resting a bit on the hammock itself instead of the straps so it doesn't touch ground. Not sure how this will affect durability, but it's working great for now!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Best Hammock I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've bought at least 10 hammocks over the last 4 - 5 years and this is by far the best hammock I have ever owned. Seriously the best. Its super comfy and sits evenly and level. I tried sleeping with multiple pitches and I still slept super comfy. My other hammocks seem to need very specific pitches to be comfy. I love this Hammock and will be buying from this supplier from now on.
customer_reviews.author: dmMatrix

product_meta.title: MalloMe Camping Hammock with Ropes - Double & Single Tree Hamock Outdoor Indoor 2 Person Tree Beach Accessories – Backpacking Travel Equipment Kids Max 1000 lbs Capacity - Two Carabiners Free
feature_bullets: 🌲BEST SELLING HAMMOCK!🌲 – You don't need to break the bank! We have designed this hammock to provide everything you need to get on with your hang without emptying your wallet. The set includes the MalloMe Hammock, ropes and snag free carabiners ALL IN ONE set

🛌MOST COMFORTABLE HAMMOCK EVER! – Our luxurious double hammocks are extra large measuring 320 x 200cm (126 x 79 Inches) easily fits two large adults comfortably. Perfect for boat trips, camping, backpacking, hiking, road trips, traveling, general exploration and even in your own backyard!
💪SUPER STRONG - Unique strap design has breaking strength of 1000 lbs! Twice as strong as most competitors. Hammock material made from premium 210T nylon fabric.
✅ULTRALIGHT & COMPACT - Stuff sack is conveniently sewn right into the hammock so you never lose it. Packs down to about the size of a volleyball weighs only about 1.5 lbs including hammock ropes.

🤗FAST & EASY SETUP - Unfolds from included stuff sack in just seconds. Includes two high-strength carabiners and ropes that make setting this up both fast and extremely simple for even the most novice user!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
